when.test: (name == '' or name == null) and (description == '' or description == null)

choose.when: insert into category values(null, '기본 카테고리', '기본 카테고리', #{blogId})

mapper.update: update category set name = #{name}, description = #{description} where no = #{no} and blog_id = #{blogId}
mapper.select: select no, name, description, blog_id as blogId from category where blog_id = #{blogId}
mapper.delete: delete from category where no = #{no} and blog_id = #{blogId}
